name: Mario In Mushroom Rix Land 4: Trip To Nano Island
storyline:
After the events of Mario In Mushroom Rix Land 3 when Mario defeated, destroyed and finished off Master Thwomp once and for all! Everything, was finally back at peace! Rix Land has now been restored and has been doing well with Master Thwomp defeated by Mario.

Mario is having a nice relaxing break on the Mushroom Kingdom's beach! Since Rix Land is back at peaceful healthy state. However, when Master Thwomp was defeated by Mario. Master Hand who was Master Thwomp and Bowser long time best friends since childhood. Was really angry and heartbroken by this news he heard that Mario destroyed Bowser and Master Thwomp.

Since then, Master Hand was building his own new island called Nano Island! To grab Mario's attention and to challenge him and get revenge on him by planning to destroy the Mushroom Kingdom and Rix Land with his Nano Island secret deadly laser. While Mario was busy resting on the Mushroom Kingdom's beach!

Peach, Yoshi, Luigi and all the Rix Land worker Toads tell Mario the big huge news about Master Hand's Nano Island revenge plan, and it will destroy the Mushroom Kingdom and Rix Land! Mario is shocked and furious about this!

Mario gets his cape to fly to Nano Island and Mario is ready and prepared to take down Nano Island and Master Hand once and for all!!!! Will Mario save his Mushroom Kingdom and Rix Land?
summary: A very difficult hack for SMW with 50 exits
